name: Treehouse "Build a Simple PHP Application" Project: shirts4mike
tagline: A simple PHP eCommerce website application through Treehouse. Initial provided files: images, external CSS, and static index.html.
body:
### Project Description
The first round of this project was completed in June 2015. The PHP skills exercised are very rudimentary:

* Basic variable and function usage
* Include files
* Foreach loops and basic logic based on current page

### Help Me Not Suck
See something? Say something! Feel free to push your own changes. I appreciate the feedback and help as I learn!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
